name: AMD Microcode signature vulnerability
description: AMD systems from Zen 1 through Zen 4 have a vulnerability that may allow an attacker with system administrative privilege to load malicious CPU microcode patches.
There are software mitigations for this vulnerability, but this check is whether the firmware has been updated to prevent it
failure-impact: The attacker is able to load malicious microcode.

failure-results.not-locked: platform is not vulnerable to the attack

success-results.locked: platform is vulnerable to the attack

references.https://bughunters.google.com/blog/54248: Zen and the Art of Microcode Hacking
